rev.desc.rev.desc: Removed call to obsolete function current.window()
Modified to call create.file instead of icm.create.file when creating a join or attribute dbdict from a format.
Modified to use updated version of create.file instead of icm.create.file.
Added invalid filename exit from icm.create.file. Corrected setup of filename to include a nullsub incase filename was changed.
Modified check.gui to call forms.designer on both text and gui formats.
Changed normal exit of delete panel and no recs selected exit of check.for.format panel to exit.cancel.
Dbdicts are no longer automatically created after the formats; a message box now prompts the user to choose.
Replaced fc/link radd panels with bu.record.add to no longer use icm message #55.
Changed icm.create.file "exists" exit from exit.cancel to exit.normal to allow a device type to be created even if one of the dbdicts already exists.

descript.descript: Removed call to obsolete function current.window()
Modified to call create.file instead of icm.create.file when creating a join or attribute dbdict from a format.
Modified to use updated version of create.file instead of icm.create.file.
Added invalid filename exit from icm.create.file. Corrected setup of filename to include a nullsub incase filename was changed.
Modified check.gui to call forms.designer on both text and gui formats.
Changed normal exit of delete panel and no recs selected exit of check.for.format panel to exit.cancel.
Dbdicts are no longer automatically created after the formats; a message box now prompts the user to choose.
Replaced fc/link radd panels with bu.record.add to no longer use icm message #55.
Changed icm.create.file "exists" exit from exit.cancel to exit.normal to allow a device type to be created even if one of the dbdicts already exists.
